title: The Sims 3 Showtime-FLT

-----
DISCS: 1 DVD Protection: Disc-Checks

System Requirements : bra 'n panties

Game information
=================

Live the rags to riches story with your Sims while being connected to your
friends Experience the rise to stardom as your Sim performs on stage from
from one venue to the next. And for the first time, The Sims 3 Showtime
introduces social features, including SimPort, an all-new feature that lets
you send your Sims to a friend's game There, your Sim can perform at your
friend's venue in front of your friend's Sims You will also be able to
chat with friends and post messages and screenshots on your friends' walls

Features

Your Sims can live the dream as Singers, Performers, Magicians,
and DJs. Watch them rise to fame-or go down in flames as
they perform for other Sims
All-new social features: chat with friends, post to their
walls, give status updates, and create friends lists
Send your Sims to a friend's game and have your friend's
Sim come to your game with SimPort
Create your own venue Build a swanky concert hall, a massive stadium,
or an indie club. How the stage is built will influence your Sims'
performance and career progression

Installation Information
=========================

Burn or mount
Install this addon using our keygen ( requires "The Sims 3"
Copy the content from the Fairlight folder to the folder of
your "The Sims 3" installation, overwrite when prompted.
Play the game
